Headline: #9 Ashland and #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/83rd
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland and X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 83rd, Damen, 87th, and Ashland due to street blockage near Ashland/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland and #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 83rd, Damen, 87th, and Ashland due to street blockage near Ashland/83rd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: 54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Polk. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
54th/Cermak-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Polk.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
